p: Another indication of the bioconjugation was that the amid II band of the M2e-specific IgY-ALP bioconjugate ( Figure 6) had a higher intensity than the amid II bands of M2e-specific IgY antibody at 1,537 cm −1 and ALP enzyme at 1,556 cm −1. The shifting value of the peak was 6 cm −1 according to the spectrum of the M2e-specific IgY antibody.
